title: Implement tsk show in Rust
description: Implement show command in Rust. Match Python output format.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Goal: implement tsk show in Rust. Acceptance: read issue by id, human output, --json output, missing issue errors, and steps for issue_show.feature.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Implemented Rust tsk show with issue lookup/display helpers and show steps. Ran: cd rust && cargo test
